original_solution:
<STEP>Let's call 99 x. So we want to calculate $x^2+x+1$.</STEP>
<STEP>$100*99=9900$.</STEP>
<STEP>Now we just add 1 to this result.</STEP>
<STEP>So, $99^2+99+1=9900+1=9901$.</STEP>
<STEP>Right. So, $99^2+99+1=9901$.

# Answer

9901</STEP>
